ygData.subject: Re: Now about 1hs vs. 2hs Re: Rangers and warriors
ygData.msgSnippet: summoned by shamans or magicians.  they go poof when you logout or crash, along with all the items in them. ... From: schlaban yocksovik
ygData.messageBody:
summoned by shamans or magicians. they go poof when you logout or crash, along with all the items in them.

>>> "schlaban yocksovik" <anonymaste@...> 5.25.99 3:24:49 AM >>>
From: "schlaban yocksovik" <anonymaste@...>

Dimensional bags....hmmmm please elaborate,
This sounds like something I want bad.

Vashi, Eternal warriors


>From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
>
>
> > Weight also impacts your possible lootage potential; lighter 'carry'
> > gear/weapons = more loot to take back! This has got to be a good
> > thing, neh?
> >
>Two words for you - dimensional bags.
>
>Just dont do what I have done, log out with 5 full dimensional bags of
>loot.
>
